post.title: lnib: iphone 4 16gb locked to rogers
post.content: selling my iphone 4 16gb locked to rogers $600obo used for 5 days has front and back screen protector and it's still eligable for the free apple case program pm or email me jackykwok124@gmail.com need this gone asap just found out work is paying for my blackberry so i don't need this no more pictures upon request
